alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Northern Outer Banks (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:01AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dare County through 130 AM EDT... At 101 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stumpy Point, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stumpy Point, Nags Head, Manns Harbor, Manteo, Whalebone, Roanoke Island Festival Park, Jockeys Ridge State Park, Wanchese, Nags Head Fishing Pier, Bodie Island Lighthouse and Outer Banks Fishing Pier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
